typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		eid as integer,
		ename as string,
		gender as string,
		state as string,
		department as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(department=='IT'),
	updateIf(gender=='Male')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		eid as integer,
		ename as string,
		gender as string,
		state as string,
		department as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['eid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		gender,
		state,
		department,
		salary
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
